email_body: "HTTP: The Definitive Guide" documents everything technical people need for using HTTP efficiently. Written by experts with years of practical and teaching experience, this book is the definitive resource on HTTP and related core web technologies because it clearly explains the "why" as well as the "how." Readers will learn how web applications work, how the core internet protocols and architectural building blocks interact, and how to correctly implement internet clients and servers. To order your copy or for more information (including sample chapter, Table of Contents, index, etc), see: http://www.oreilly.com/catalog/httptdg/?CMP=EM8586 or call 1-800-998-9938 or email orders@oreilly.com
